title: What did Ibn Sirin say in interpreting a dream about spitting?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about spitting: Spitting is a disgusting and inappropriate habit, and it is rejected by all people. Also, seeing spitting during sleep causes confusion and doubt in the souls of dreamers about its consequences for them and different interpretations. This topic is from one world to another, some of the most important interpretations related to this topic have been collected. In this article, let us get to know it. Interpretation of a dream about spitting Scientists interpret the dream Spitting in a dream is an indication of the great position that the dreamer occupies in his field of work and the fear that he instills in the hearts of others towards him due to his confidence The big one himself, and spitting in his sleep symbolizes that he will obtain many benefits and good things in his life in the coming period, and if a man sees in his dream that the spit has a strange color, it is a sign of the changes that will occur in his life in the coming period and he will be very happy with them. In the event that If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is spitting on the road, this indicates great prosperity for his business in the coming period and he will achieve a lot of profits from behind. Interpretation of the dream of spitting by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of spitting in a dream and it was in the form of blood as a sign that he is receiving his money from sources that do not Pleases God Almighty and must stop before meeting Him to obtain results that please God. Do not please him at all, even if he sees in his dream that someone is spitting on him, then this is a sign that someone is violating his rights and encroaching on his property, but the truth will soon come out. In case the dreamer sees in his dream that he is spitting on him, then this is a sign that he will receive great abundance. Of money in the coming period as a result of great effort in his work, and spitting in his dream can also be evidence of this. He will be healthy enough to live for a period of time. For a long time, the dreamer of a car spitting in his dream shows that he is very busy with his future work and how to develop it. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about spitting for a woman Single Scientists interpret the dream of spitting in a dream for a single woman who was already engaged, and this is evidence of many disagreements with her fiancé, her discomfort with him for this reason, and her strong desire to separate from him. He is very afraid that he will not feel the same. If the dreamer sees in her dream one of her relatives spitting on her, this is a sign that she will receive a lot of money in the coming period behind a family inheritance in which she will get her share. The period makes her feel very distressed. Interpretation of a dream of spitting for a married woman: The dream of a married woman spitting in a dream, and it was from her husband, indicates that she will soon receive many good things behind him, and this dream can also express that she will soon receive the good news of her pregnancy, and her pregnancy. The husband will be very happy with this news and if the dreamer sees in her dream that she spits in her house, this is a sign that she is helping her life partner with household expenses because of the many responsibilities that fall on his shoulders and his lightness. Say

title: What is the interpretation of watermelon in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of watermelon in a dream for a single woman? Dreams are divided into three types of dreams that arise from the mind’s attempt to organize the thoughts and information it receives during the day, dreams that arise from Satan’s attempt to plant disturbing thoughts in the dreamer’s mind during his sleep, and the messages that God sends to the pioneer as messages to urge him. Through it, he is attentive to some things in his life, so dreams can connect with events from real life, so many are interested in them. Knowing their interpretation and the reason for seeing them in a dream, so in this article we will discover today what is the interpretation of watermelon in a dream for singles.Interpretation of seeing watermelon for a single womanSeeing red watermelon in a dream generally indicates kindness and vitality, but in the case of seeing white watermelon, this vision indicates happiness Dreaming about watermelon indicates to an unmarried girl that her marriage is near, and God knows best. One of the indicators of seeing a watermelon in a dream for an unmarried woman is that it indicates her marriage to a man who holds a prominent position. If an unmarried woman sees that she is eating a watermelon out of season, then this vision is a sign of The sorrows and problems that you are already suffering from. As for the case of eating watermelon in its prime, this vision symbolizes goodness and abundance in its food. Interpretation of a vision of cut watermelon for a single woman: If you see cut watermelon in a dream, this vision indicates kindness, nourishment, and a short marriage, and God knows best. In conclusion Fruits and foods are mentioned in dreams, which often mean goodness, nourishment, and blessing, especially if the dreamer eats them in the dream, but there are some details that must accompany the dream in order for a person to interpret it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a severed hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cut off hand in a dream according to Ibn Sirin for a married woman. Cutting off hands in a dream can be one of the dreams that is considered very disturbing because it makes the dreamer very anxious and afraid, and this problem may make him look for some clues or some excuses that indicate that this is disturbing, The interpretation of this vision has been reported by many commentators and many jurists, and in this article we will refer to some of the commentators’ interpretations. Follow us. Cutting a hand in a dream. Some jurists have mentioned that when a person sees his hand cut off in a dream, the problem may be due to the breakup of the relationship between loved ones, and this may be The problem is a sign of the spouse's divorce or quarrel between them. When a mother sees that her hand is cut off in her dream, this indicates her children’s disobedience to her, or it may mean that she will face a major problem, especially with her family, and this problem may lead to a permanent problem. It was said: Seeing the hand of someone who has died is evidence of stopping prayer and shortening the worship of his hand. The reason is that he took the money and it is not his right, and in this case the ruler must return, as he traces everything that the deceased did before his death for his behavior and actions, and he must be prepared to pay zakat and work in praying for him constantly. When the dreamer dreams that his hand was cut off from The back, this may be a sign of the dreamer's corruption, or it may also be a sign that he has committed many sins and transgressions, so the dreamer must turn to God and repent. In addition, some commentators have suggested that when we see a severed left hand, this may be It is a sign of the death of a brother and means the death of a sister. Seeing a hand with many holes may mean that the viewer is suffering from severe anxiety and may mean that the dreamer is surrounded by many problems and troubles. What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting off hands in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that it is common Seeing hands being cut off in a dream, this indicates a big problem or it could be a trial occurring between brothers and the result of this problem is the collapse of relations between brothers. When you dream that your hands are cut off and you see a lot of blood, this is an omen that can show a person many blessings, And abundant wealth, but it is an omen for men regarding the person whose hand was cut off, and blood is not an omen. . That the dreamer is about to encounter something that indicates his throat being cut, or this may be an omen that he does not have a son. If the dreamer makes eye contact where he cuts his hand from his palm, then this vision may be benign and may also represent many good things that the dreamer will achieve soon Or later. If a traveler sees his mother’s hand cut off in a dream, this may be an omen that he will return from a life abroad, and it may also portend that he will earn a lot of money. A dream about a cut off palm in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has abandoned prayer, or that he He took a false oath, or that he bore false witness, or that whoever sees it has been robbed, and the matter is the same as the dreamer’s fault. Burning and cutting the hand in a dream Burned hands mean that the seeker will lose a lot of money and fail in managing the business, but if the eye is a seeker...

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting sunglasses in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about getting sunglasses in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about getting sunglasses in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and if it is a good or bad sign, reaching the truth of the dream and interpreting it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about getting sunglasses in a dream: In the case of his personal opinion that he got sunglasses in a dream, this can indicate the happiness that the dreamer was enjoying at that time. In the event that someone saw that he took sunglasses from someone, then he This means that he is hiding something important and concealing it. Dreaming of someone wearing sunglasses in a dream can indicate protection for children and fear for their future. It is possible that seeing someone wearing sunglasses in a dream indicates that there are some secrets in the dreamer’s life that he does not want to talk about. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a hairpin in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he received a hairpin can indicate abundant goodness that will come to his life in the coming period. Dreaming about receiving a stick of hair in a dream may indicate the end of the suffering that the dreamer suffered in the previous period. If you see a hair stick in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. Everyone who sees in his dream that he has pulled out a hair clip can indicate happy events that will happen to the dreamer during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a call A phone call from someone in a dream. In the event that a person sees that he received a phone call from someone in a dream, this may indicate the high position that the dreamer has reached in his life at that time. In the event that a person sees that he received a phone call from someone Else, it may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer during these days. Anyone who sees in a dream that he received a phone call from another person can indicate happy things that are happening to the dreamer in his life at that time. A person’s dream may indicate that he picked up someone’s phone Another in a dream indicates that he overcame some of the difficulties that the dreamer was facing. Interpretation of a dream about receiving the Qur’an as a gift in a dream. If one sees that he received a gift from the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that occurred in the life of the dreamer during this period. A vision of another in a dream may indicate that he has overcome some difficulties that the dreamer was facing. A gift from the Qur’an in a dream indicates happy events that will come to the dreamer during this period. In the event that one sees that he received the Qur’an as a gift in a dream, this may indicate good changes and happy news that will occur in the dreamer’s life during those days. Whoever sees in a dream that he received the Qur’an A gift in a dream, as it may indicate good circumstances and closeness to God, Blessed and Most High, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a cake from someone in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he received cakes in a dream from a person may indicate that he heard happy news at that time, And God knows best. Dreaming of receiving sweets in a dream can indicate stability and family happiness for the dreamer. In

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin: To see clothes in a dream means that you hear good news, and Ibn Sirin explained in the interpretation of the dream that you are wearing that it means the earliest date of marriage or pregnancy for married people. Women, and this is if the clothes are new, and if they are old and torn, then this means illness and pain in real life and death. New clothes appear and you hear the good news. We will explain the full explanation to you below, follow us. A dream to see clothes for a single woman. White clothes in a dream indicate the approaching Wedding date. Seeing clothes in a dream means meeting your life partner in the future. Seeing a gift of clothing for a single woman indicates that there is love and friendship between her and the one who gave her these clothes. Dreaming of seeing clothes for a married woman. Seeing new clothes in a married woman’s dream is a sign of a good life and good coexistence between them. And between her husband. As for seeing her husband wearing her new clothes, it is proven that she will become pregnant. She dreams of seeing clothes for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman buys clothes for a child in her dream, which indicates that childbirth is approaching and easy. However, if she finds that she is buying boy clothes, the good news is that she will have a boy. Giving clothes as gifts Indicates happy occasions. Seeing a gift of clothes indicates the approaching wedding date. Seeing a married woman indicates that the deceased has given her clothes indicating the approaching pregnancy. Dreaming of seeing clothes in a dream. Looking at a lot of clothes while cleaning is a sign of earning sufficient livelihood. It appears Blue clothes are fears. Yellow clothes in a dream indicate the dreamer's weak character, illness or envy. If a girl finds that she is making clothes, it means that the fulfillment of her dream is imminent. Sewing clothes in a dream can also mean kindness and understanding between a person and his family and that he is a loving person. If You saw someone making clothes in a dream, it could mean that he is trying to improve his life. Seeing old clothes in a dream has many interpretations. It can indicate the return of old relationships between two people who have separated from each other. It can indicate the dreamer's sadness and thinking about past memories. Seeing torn clothes indicates illness or separation. Seeing a lot of clothes in the wardrobe or wardrobe indicates good luck and good news. Many and varied clothes in the dreamer’s dream indicate an abundance of opportunities for work or marriage, whether for a young man or a girl. Clothes indicate Worn ones lead to exhaustion and illness. At the end of our article, we spoke to you in the previous lines with sufficient and comprehensive information about the above topic, which is the interpretation of the dream of seeing clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin.

title: Interpretation of seeing a leper escaping in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lizard escaping in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Katheer and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision site roy2a.com, as seeing a gecko is one of the bad visions mentioned that brings harm and evil to the owner of the vision, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our article for single girls, married women, pregnant women, men, unmarried young men and divorced women. What is the interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream by Nabulsi? Seeing a gecko in a dream by Nabulsi is one of the bad dreams that indicate following the path of lies, getting close to bad friends, and committing many sins. Seeing the spread of geckos in the house in a dream is a sign that others are talking about the seer and slandering with gossip and disorder. Seeing leprosy on the body of the viewer indicates the deterioration of his health and the loss of all his money. Seeing you kill a gecko in a dream is getting rid of the evil approaching the owner of the fortune teller and stabilizing his material and social life. Seeing a gecko entering the house is one of the bad dreams that symbolizes bringing evil and great evil from those close to him and surrounding him with many From enemies. See also: Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq? Seeing a gecko entering the dreamer's house in a dream is an indication that he is surrounded by bad friends who are planning to harm him. Seeing a gecko in a dream indicates the abundance of haters and envy in his life and the need to stay away from them. Seeing the presence of geckos in the room of insight It indicates that his family is entering a serious psychological crisis and exposing them to deadly envy. Seeing in a dream killing a gecko with his hand indicates the loss of sadness and anxiety about his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a massacre in a dream What is the interpretation of my vision that I killed a leper in a dream? Seeing a gecko killed with his hand in a dream shows his wisdom, faith in others, and his ability to succeed on his own. Dreaming of killing a gecko by blowing on it indicates that he brought him a lot of money through suspicion and corruption. Seeing you kill a gecko in a dream indicates conspiracies against the dreamer and his success in discovering them. Seeing the killing of a large lizard in a dream indicates his victory over his enemies and his attempt to kill them and get rid of their evil. Seeing the resistance of the great gecko in a dream Insistence Killing him indicates that the monarch will resist all his hardships and judgments and reach a good standard of living. See also: Interpretation of seeing a person you love sick in a dream What is the interpretation of a single man who sees a leper in a dream? Seeing an unmarried girl bitten by a leper in a dream expresses her severe pain and sadness due to the great damage that has befallen his life, while she hears insulting words to her from a member of her family in the event that she is severely bitten by leprosy. Seeing a single person bitten by a gecko in a dream indicates her neglect of people's words, and in the event of treating the bite site, it indicates her success in dealing with any problem and finding radical solutions to it. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a leper in a dream? Seeing a married woman with leprosy in a dream indicates the presence of envious people in her life and their desire to destroy her relationship with her husband and separate them from each other

What is the interpretation of seeing a leper in a dream according to Nabulsi? Seeing a leper in a dream from Nabulsi is one of the bad dreams that indicate following the path of lies, getting close to bad friends, and committing many sins. Seeing the spread of geckos in the home In a dream, it is a sign that others are talking about the seer and slandering him with gossip and disorder. Seeing the presence of leprosy on the body of the seer indicates the deterioration of his health and the loss of all his money. Seeing yourself killing a leper in a dream means getting rid of the evil that is approaching the fortuneteller and stabilizing his financial and social life. Seeing a gecko entering The house is one of the bad dreams that symbolize bringing evil and great evil from those close to it and surrounding it with many enemies. See also: Interpretation of seeing leprosy in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing leprosy in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream? Seeing a gecko entering the dreamer’s house in the dream is an indication that he is surrounded by bad friends who are planning to harm him. Seeing a leper in a dream indicates the abundance of haters and envious people in his life and the need to stay away from them. Seeing the presence of geckos in the insight room indicates that his family is entering a serious psychological crisis and exposing them to deadly envy. Seeing in a dream killing a leper with his own hands indicates a loss of sadness and anxiety for his life. See also: Interpretation Seeing a massacre in a dream What is the interpretation of my vision that I killed a leper in a dream? Seeing a leper killed by hand in a dream shows his wisdom, faith in others, and ability to succeed on his own. Dreaming of killing a leper by blowing on him indicates that he brought him a lot of money through suspicion and corruption. Seeing you killing a leper in a dream indicates conspiracies against The dreamer and his success in discovering it. Seeing killing a large lizard in a dream indicates his victory over his enemies and an attempt to kill them and get rid of their evil. Seeing the resistance of the great leper in the dream. Insisting on killing him indicates that the monarch will resist all his difficulties and rulings and reach a good standard of living. See also: Interpretation of seeing a person She loves him sick in a dream. What is the interpretation of a single man who sees a leper in a dream? Seeing an unmarried girl being bitten by a leper in a dream expresses her intense pain and sadness due to the great damage to his life, while hearing insulting words to her from a member of her family in the event that she is severely bitten by leprosy. Seeing one person bitten by a gecko in a dream indicates that she neglects what people say, and in the case of treating the site of the bite, it indicates her success in dealing with any problem and finding radical solutions to it. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a gecko in a dream? Seeing a married woman suffering from leprosy in a dream indicates the presence of Envious people in her life and their desire to destroy her relationship with her husband and separate them from each other

title: Learn more about the 8 most important reasons for seeing a whale in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin.

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a whale in a dream: The whale is considered one of the huge marine animals found on the surface of the Earth, if not the largest, it is also a predatory animal and poses a great danger, and because it is in the depths of the sea only other marine creatures except humans who work in this field feel its danger. It is rare for one to see a whale on land. However, in reality, it often appears in the dreams of many people and here we will explain in detail the visions of seeing a whale in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a whale: The appearance of a whale in one’s dream may indicate anxiety and tension, in relation to the plight of Prophet Yunus (peace be upon him) in the belly of the whale and seeing it indicates To some obstacles that may befall humans in the field. From work. Watching a whale swimming and diving in the water means that the dreamer’s status will be taken away from him. The sudden appearance of a whale under water means that you have bought something. Anyone who sees himself riding a boat or ship and sees a whale walking next to him, this vision means that your family, relatives and those around you in your environment will They support you and stand behind you in your pursuit of achieving your ambitions and solving your problems. Whoever sees himself diving and swimming with whales around him as if they were his friends, this is evidence of the security that a man enjoys. Whoever hears the sound of a whale in his dream, then hears the voice of those who ask for forgiveness and return and repent, and perhaps he is one of them. Seeing a whale swimming in a place not intended for it, such as a lake, pond, or even a river, means that the common people of a certain country will be afflicted by God. A woman who sees a whale attacking her may indicate that her husband believes that he is not fully fulfilling his duties. Hence, he fights with her from time to time. A married woman who sees a whale in a dream indicates that her husband will obtain great sustenance, and this sustenance may be money, a job opportunity, or any other good thing. A pregnant woman who sees a whale will enjoy good health and safety during Her birth. A woman who escapes from a whale in a dream will gain her freedom after being imprisoned or restricted by many restrictions. A woman who catches a whale is trying to trap a strong man in her net. A whale in a dream for singles. Seeing a whale by one girl in her dream is a harbinger of facing many problems, and seeing more A whale in a dream means the state of stress and tension that this girl is experiencing. What is the interpretation of a whale in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream? Men who see a whale in a dream show a pious old man who fears God, loves justice, and does not persecute anyone. Seeing a whale swallowing you in a dream means that you will suffer from poverty and need. And that your life will become worthless at some point, so you must try to get past this stage. The huge whale that a person sees is evidence of the sorrows that befall a person from time to time. Your dream will be interpreted in seconds on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website by Google. Interpretation of seeing a black whale in Ibn Sirin’s dream: The colors of whales as we see them on television are different and varied. There are blue whales in different proportions, and there are black whales as well, and whoever sees a black whale in his dream, this indicates: great troubles that will befall a person and he will suffer from them, which will make him upset in life.

When you see suicide in a dream, it may be evidence of repentance and satisfaction with the judiciary, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a wristwatch in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wristwatch in a dream in detail Interpretation of a wristwatch in a dream We present to you on the Moments website what is new and distinctive in this article Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch More about the interpretation of the watch on our website Moments. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the sea in a dream Interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream by Ibn Sirin In this paragraph, we talk about Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream in detail in this paragraph. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation that seeing a wristwatch in a dream is an unpleasant vision. A wristwatch in a dream indicates bad news. As for seeing the ticking of the clock in a dream, this vision indicates a warning of something that may be dangerous for the dreamer. As for those who see a gold wristwatch in their dream, seeing it means longevity as well as success, profit and recovery. As for those who see in their dream that they have bought a new watch, this indicates a major change in the dreamer's life. If the watch is made of gold, this is a sign of fulfilling wishes. Whether the wristwatch is silver, it is a sign of the insight of the religion. As for those who see in their dream that the time for their gift has come, their vision shows their tireless pursuit of achieving their goals and their vision is a sign of their progress on the path Correct. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is giving someone a watch as a gift, this vision indicates the emergence of a dispute between the dreamer and this person. Seeing a wristwatch in a dream for a married woman If a married woman dreams of buying a watch, this vision indicates the stability and calm of her marital life. As for if a married woman sees in her dream that she is raising her hand from her hand, this vision indicates the outbreak of marital disputes. As for removing the wall clock in a dream for a married woman, this indicates that anxiety will go away. Interpretation of seeing a watch in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees a watch in her sleep, this vision indicates that she will give birth to a female. The golden watch in a pregnant woman's dream indicates good and happy news. Interpretation of a wristwatch in a dream for a single woman The watch in an unmarried woman's dream generally indicates the approaching date of her wedding. If it is a gold watch, it indicates marriage in an unmarried woman's dream. As for the silver watch in an unmarried woman's dream, it indicates engagement and engagement. As for the unmarried woman who sees in her dream that her watch has stopped, her vision symbolizes that her period of celibacy and waiting is long, as she may reach her thirties without any commitment or marriage. Interpretation of a dream A watch for a young man Interpretation of a dream about seeing a watch in a young man's dream as evidence of his failure to achieve his goals in life. Giving a watch in a young man's dream means that he neglects many things in his life and cares about trivialities. Seeing the purchase of a watch warns him of a positive change for the better in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a brown watch Interpretation of a dream about a brown watch on the hand indicates success and excellence in reality. As well as seeing a black watch when a passenger returns after a long absence. Interpretation of a dream about a watch for a man A man's vision of losing his watch indicates that he has lost many opportunities that would make his life better

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman who is not pregnant in Ibn Sirin’s dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman who is not pregnant in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Many famous interpreters have interpreted this dream, such as: Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Imam al-Sadiq. The interpretation of this dream differs from the nature of seeing it in a dream, as it can indicate many different meanings. Knowing the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman who is not pregnant in Ibn Sirin’s dream in detail, follow the aspects of this article. What is the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman? It can indicate Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman has a wide range of different interpretations, with many interpreters interpreting it as a sign of obtaining many good things or as an indication that this woman wants to become pregnant and from the nature of seeing a dream can indicate one’s desire. The truth is that it happens, and it is natural for all women to want to have a child, especially those who have delayed childbearing, and therefore this idea can control the mind on alert, and it can also indicate success in marriage and professional life and that woman’s life will change for the better. Interpretation of a dream Pregnancy for a married woman with children: In the event that the woman already has children and she sees in a dream that she is pregnant, the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman in this case may indicate that she is afraid of the responsibility that arises from having children, and this may indicate her love for children, or it may indicate that she She will give birth to a child. Another, and this baby will come with abundant food, and life will be good, and Almighty God will give her peace of mind and peace of mind. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman: In the event that an unmarried girl dreams that she is pregnant, this dream may differ from the interpretation of this dream for a married woman, as this may indicate that she will get She will get a living and money, but she will get it the hard way. She will achieve her dreams with difficulty. This may indicate that she will suffer from some problems in her next life but they will be resolved soon and it may be evidence that someone with good morals will propose marriage to her soon and it may show that she loves children and is attached to them and they miss them very much, and that she longs to have children. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen interprets a dream about pregnancy for a married woman and other dreams related to the topic of pregnancy, as Ibn Shaheen says in interpreting this dream in all its aspects: If an unmarried girl sees that she is pregnant in a dream by someone she knows, this may mean that she will commit adultery and will feel pain. Severe in the coming period. In the event that an unmarried girl sees that she is pregnant by people she knows from afar, this may mean that she will get a lot of livelihood or a job. If a married woman sees that she is pregnant in a dream, this may mean that she is suffering from difficult problems. She cannot adapt to it or solve it, and she will face difficulties and overcome them, God willing. When a married woman who is not pregnant sees in her dream that she is pregnant and has given birth to her fetus, this may mean that she will face problems in her life and that all her problems will be solved, God willing. And when she sees bitterness,
